Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement cross-platform Go version with native binaries

This commit introduces a complete rewrite in Go, providing:

Features:
- Cross-platform support: Windows, Linux, macOS
- Single binary distribution (no dependencies)
- Two operation modes: interactive menu + CLI commands
- Automatic backup system with JSON storage
- Platform-specific env var handling (registry on Windows, shell profiles on Unix)

Architecture:
- cmd/: Cobra-based CLI commands (configure, rollback, show, backup)
- internal/config/: Multi-platform environment variable management
- internal/backup/: JSON-based backup and restore system
- internal/ui/: Interactive menu with ANSI colors
- main.go: Entry point

Build system:
- GitHub Actions workflow for automated releases
- Cross-compilation for 6 platform targets (Windows/Linux/macOS on amd64/arm64)
- Produces optimized static binaries (~5-10 MB)

Documentation:
- Comprehensive README.md with installation and usage
- Migration guide from Python version
- Platform-specific troubleshooting

Compatibility:
- 100% functional parity with Python version
- Compatible with existing backup files
- Same environment variables and behavior
